posts.post_content:
Trying to free up some funds for a future purchase. I have a T206 Titus for sale. The card is in gd+/vg condition and the price is 225/BO. I would also trade the card. Scans can be viewed in the pre-war section of my site. The link is in my signature line.
                                        Thanks,
                                          Steve

Here are the scans from your collector focus page (nice card, BTW):
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/Soxinseven/pre-war-cards/10977/t206-titus[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/Soxinseven/pre-war-cards/10978/t206-titus[/IMG]
